```{=html}


<div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-6 py-12">

  <h2 class="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-widest mb-6">Domain Knowledge</h2>

  <!-- ===================== DOMAIN CONCEPTS ===================== -->
  <section class="mb-20">
      <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-slate-200 overflow-hidden mb-12">
        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2">

          <!-- LEFT: text + hierarchy viz -->
          <div class="p-8 flex flex-col justify-center gap-6">
            <div>
              <h3 class="text-xl font-bold text-slate-900 mb-2">The Precinct</h3>
              <p class="text-slate-600 leading-relaxed mb-4">
                The smallest political unit in the election. It is a specific geographic shape (polygon).
                Everyone living inside this shape votes at the same location (or gets the same ballot style).
              </p>
            </div>

            <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 rounded-xl p-4">
              <div class="flex items-center justify-between mb-3">
                <div class="text-xs font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-widest">
                  State (Utah)
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- nested boxes -->
              <div class="relative rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white p-3">
                <div class="text-[10px] font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-400 mb-2">County (Utah County)</div>


                <div class="rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 p-3">
                  <div class="flex items-center justify-between mb-2">
                    <div class="text-[10px] font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-400">Precinct</div>
                  </div>

                  <div class="rounded-md border border-brand-200 bg-brand-50 p-3">
                    <div class="flex items-center justify-between mb-2">
                      <div class="text-[10px] font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-brand-700">Ballot Style</div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="rounded border border-slate-200 bg-white p-2">
                      <div class="text-[10px] font-bold text-slate-500">Contest / Race</div>
                      <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-400">appears on ballot</div>
                    </div>
                    
                  </div>

                </div>
              </div>

              <div class="mt-3 text-[11px] text-slate-500">
                Think of it as: <span class="font-mono text-slate-600">State → County → Precinct → Ballot Style → Contest</span>
              </div>
            </div>

          </div>

          <!-- RIGHT: county + precinct grid -->
          <div class="bg-slate-100 p-8 flex items-center justify-center pattern-grid relative">
            <div class="w-56 h-56 border-2 border-slate-300 bg-white rounded-lg relative shadow-sm overflow-hidden">

              <!-- County label: guaranteed visible -->
              <div class="absolute top-2 left-2 z-30">
                <span class="text-[10px] text-slate-600 font-bold uppercase bg-white/90 backdrop-blur px-2 py-1 rounded border border-slate-200">
                  County
                </span>
              </div>

              <!-- 3x3 grid -->
              <div class="absolute inset-6 grid grid-cols-3 grid-rows-3 gap-1 z-10">
                <!-- 1 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 2 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 3 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 4 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 5 (center highlighted) -->
                <div class="bg-brand-100 border-2 border-brand-600 rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center shadow-lg z-20">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-extrabold text-brand-800 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 6 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 7 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 8 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>

                <!-- 9 -->
                <div class="bg-slate-50 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-100 transition-colors rounded-sm flex items-center justify-center">
                  <span class="text-[10px] font-semibold text-slate-300 uppercase tracking-wide select-none">Precinct</span>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>


    <!-- reg vs turnout -->
    <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-slate-200 overflow-hidden mb-12">
      <div class="p-8 border-b border-slate-100">
        <h3 class="text-xl font-bold text-slate-900 mb-2">Registration vs. Turnout</h3>
        <p class="text-slate-600">Understanding the subset of people who actually generate data.</p>
      </div>

      <div class="p-8 bg-slate-50 grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8 text-center">

        <div class="relative">
          <div class="h-32 flex items-end justify-center mb-3">
            <div class="w-24 h-32 bg-slate-300 rounded-t-lg relative">
              <div class="absolute bottom-2 w-full text-center text-xs font-mono text-slate-600">1,000</div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <h4 class="font-bold text-slate-900 text-sm">voter_registration</h4>
          <p class="text-xs text-slate-500 mt-1">People legally allowed to vote within the precinct.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="relative">
          <div class="h-32 flex items-end justify-center mb-3">
            <div class="w-24 h-20 bg-blue-500 rounded-t-lg relative">
              <div class="absolute bottom-2 w-full text-center text-xs font-mono text-white">400</div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <h4 class="font-bold text-slate-900 text-sm">voter_turnout</h4>
          <p class="text-xs text-slate-500 mt-1">People who submitted a ballot within the precinct.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="relative">
          <div class="h-32 flex items-end justify-center mb-3">
            <div class="w-24 h-16 bg-indigo-600 rounded-t-lg relative">
              <div class="absolute bottom-2 w-full text-center text-xs font-mono text-white">350</div>
              <div class="absolute -top-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 text-[10px] text-red-500 font-bold whitespace-nowrap">
                ↓ Drop-off (Rolloff)
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <h4 class="font-bold text-slate-900 text-sm">contest_total_votes</h4>
          <p class="text-xs text-slate-500 mt-1">People who voted in a <em>specific race</em> within the precinct.</p>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Vote-for-N  -->
    <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-slate-200 overflow-hidden">
      <div class="p-8 border-b border-slate-100">
        <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-start md:justify-between gap-4">
          <div>
            <h3 class="text-xl font-bold text-slate-900 mb-2">Vote-for-N Contests</h3>
            <p class="text-slate-600">
              
              While most races restrict voters to a single vote per candidate (<code class="font-mono">vote_for</code> = 1), some races like City Council races allow voters to vote for multiple candidates (<code class="font-mono">vote_for</code> &gt; 1).<br><br>
              
              When <code class="font-mono">vote_for</code> &gt; 1, <code class="font-mono">contest_total_votes</code> counts
              <strong>selections</strong>, not ballots, <code class="font-mono">contest_total_votes</code> can exceed <code class="font-mono">precinct_ballots_cast</code>
              and make <code class="font-mono">rolloff_rate</code> look negative.
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="p-8 bg-slate-50">
        <div class="bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl p-6">


          <!-- equation -->
          <div class="text-center text-sm font-mono text-slate-600 mb-4">
            max possible selections = <span class="font-mono">precinct_ballots_cast × vote_for</span>
          </div>

          <!-- illustrative numbers (keep or swap to your real example) -->
          <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2 text-[11px] text-slate-600 mb-3">
            <span class="px-2 py-1 rounded border border-slate-200 bg-slate-50">
              <span class="text-slate-400">precinct_ballots_cast</span> <span class="font-mono font-bold text-slate-800">400</span>
            </span>
            <span class="px-2 py-1 rounded border border-slate-200 bg-slate-50">
              <span class="text-slate-400">vote_for</span> <span class="font-mono font-bold text-slate-800">2</span>
            </span>
            <span class="px-2 py-1 rounded border border-slate-200 bg-slate-50">
              <span class="text-slate-400">contest_total_votes</span> <span class="font-mono font-bold text-slate-800">650</span>
            </span>
          </div>

          <!-- capacity bar: scale is max selections (800); filled=650; unused=150 -->
          <div class="flex justify-between text-[11px] text-slate-500 mb-2">
            <span>Selections in this contest (scaled to max possible selections)</span>
            <span class="font-mono">650 / 800</span>
          </div>

          <div class="h-5 rounded bg-slate-200 overflow-hidden flex">
            <div class="h-full bg-brand-600" style="width:81.25%"></div>
            <div class="h-full bg-slate-300" style="width:18.75%"></div>
          </div>

          <div class="mt-2 flex flex-wrap gap-x-6 gap-y-2 text-[11px] text-slate-500">
            <span class="inline-flex items-center gap-2">
              <span class="w-2.5 h-2.5 rounded-sm bg-brand-600"></span>
              Selections counted (<code class="font-mono">contest_total_votes</code>)
            </span>
            <span class="inline-flex items-center gap-2">
              <span class="w-2.5 h-2.5 rounded-sm bg-slate-300"></span>
              Unused selections (undervote)
            </span>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    
  </section>

  <!-- ===================== CALCULATED COLUMNS ===================== -->
  <section>

    <h2 class="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-widest mb-6">Data Dictionary</h2>


    <div class="flex flex-col gap-6">

      <!-- turnout_rate_precinct -->
      <div class="math-card bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-200">
        <div class="mb-6">
          <code class="text-lg font-bold text-brand-800 bg-brand-50 px-2 py-1 rounded">turnout_rate_precinct</code>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500 mt-1">How engaged is this neighborhood?</p>
        </div>

        <div class="flex flex-col gap-3 text-sm font-mono bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-slate-100">
          <div class="flex justify-center">
            <div class="text-center">
              <div class="border-b-2 border-slate-300 pb-1 mb-1 text-slate-700">voter_turnout</div>
              <div class="text-slate-400">voter_registration</div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="text-center text-2xl text-slate-300 leading-none">=</div>

          <div class="w-full bg-slate-200 rounded-full h-4 relative overflow-hidden">
            <div class="bg-blue-500 h-full w-[45%]"></div>
            <div class="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center text-[10px] font-bold text-slate-600">0.45</div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- choice_share -->
      <div class="math-card bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-200">
        <div class="mb-6">
          <code class="text-lg font-bold text-brand-800 bg-brand-50 px-2 py-1 rounded">choice_share</code>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500 mt-1">Percentage of the vote this candidate received.</p>
        </div>

        <!-- vertical -->
        <div class="flex flex-col gap-3 text-sm font-mono bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-slate-100">
          <div class="flex justify-center">
            <div class="text-center">
              <div class="border-b-2 border-slate-300 pb-1 mb-1 text-slate-700">precinct_votes</div>
              <div class="text-slate-400">contest_total_votes</div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="text-center text-2xl text-slate-300 leading-none">=</div>

          <div class="flex flex-col items-center gap-3">
            <div class="w-16 h-16 rounded-full border-4 border-slate-200 bg-white"
                  style="background-image: conic-gradient(#1f7fe8 0% 60%, transparent 60% 100%)"></div>
            <div class="text-xs text-slate-500 text-center">
              Candidate gets the blue slice.<br>
              Denominator is <strong>Sum of All Candidates</strong>.
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>


      <!-- margin_votes -->
      <div class="math-card bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-200">
        <div class="mb-6">
          <code class="text-lg font-bold text-brand-800 bg-brand-50 px-2 py-1 rounded">margin_votes</code>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500 mt-1">The vote gap between the top two candidates (Winner − Runner-up).</p>
        </div>

        <!-- Visual: two candidate bars + explicit difference bracket -->
        <div class="bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-slate-100">

          <!-- equation -->
          <div class="text-center text-sm font-mono text-slate-600 mb-4">
            winner_votes − runnerup_votes
          </div>

          <div class="text-center text-2xl text-slate-300 leading-none">=</div>

          <!-- bars -->
          <div class="space-y-3">
            <!-- Winner bar -->
            <div>
              <div class="flex justify-between text-[11px] text-slate-500 mb-1">
                <span>Winner</span><span class="font-mono">1,000</span>
              </div>
              <div class="h-4 rounded bg-slate-200 overflow-hidden">
                <!-- scale winner to 100% -->
                <div class="h-full w-full bg-indigo-600"></div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Runner-up bar -->
            <div>
              <div class="flex justify-between text-[11px] text-slate-500 mb-1">
                <span>Runner-up</span><span class="font-mono">800</span>
              </div>
              <div class="h-4 rounded bg-slate-200 overflow-hidden">
                <!-- 800 / 1000 ≈ 80% -->
                <div class="h-full w-[80%] bg-indigo-300"></div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- difference bracket / highlight -->
          <div class="mt-4">
            <div class="relative h-8">
              <!-- bracket sits on top of the bar track; left edge starts at runner-up end, right edge at winner end -->
              <div class="absolute left-[80%] right-0 top-1.5 h-0.5 bg-red-500"></div>
              <div class="absolute left-[80%] top-0 h-4 w-0.5 bg-red-500"></div>
              <div class="absolute right-0 top-0 h-4 w-0.5 bg-red-500"></div>
              <div class="absolute left-[80%] right-0 top-3.5 flex justify-center">
                <span class="text-[10px] font-bold text-red-600 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur px-2 py-1 rounded border border-red-100">
                  margin_votes = 200
                </span>
              </div>
            </div>

            <p class="mt-2 text-[11px] text-slate-500">
              The red span shows the <strong>extra votes</strong> the winner has beyond the runner-up.
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- rolloff_rate -->
      <div class="math-card bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-200">
        <div class="mb-6">
          <code class="text-lg font-bold text-brand-800 bg-brand-50 px-2 py-1 rounded">rolloff_rate</code>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500 mt-1">Voters who ignored this specific race.</p>
        </div>

        <!-- vertical -->
        <div class="flex flex-col gap-3 text-sm font-mono bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-slate-100">
          <div class="flex justify-center">
            <div class="text-center flex flex-col justify-center">
              <div class="border-b-2 border-slate-300 pb-1 mb-1 text-slate-700">( precinct_ballots_cast - contest_total_votes )</div>
              <div class="text-slate-400">precinct_ballots_cast</div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="text-center text-2xl text-slate-300 leading-none">=</div>

          <div class="w-full h-8 bg-slate-300 rounded overflow-hidden flex">
            <div class="bg-blue-500 h-full w-[80%] flex items-center justify-center text-white text-[10px]">Voted</div>
            <div class="bg-red-400 h-full w-[20%] flex items-center justify-center text-white text-[10px]">Blank</div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="mt-3 text-[11px] text-orange-700 bg-orange-50 p-2 rounded border border-orange-100">
          <strong>⚠️ Negative Rolloff?</strong> In "Vote for 2" races, Total Votes &gt; Ballots Cast. Rolloff becomes negative. This is normal.
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- polarization_fragmentation -->
      <div class="math-card bg-white p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-200">
        <div class="mb-6">
          <code class="inline-flex w-fit items-center font-mono text-lg font-bold text-brand-800 bg-brand-50 px-2 py-1 rounded whitespace-nowrap leading-none">polarization_fragmentation</code>
          <p class="text-sm text-slate-500 mt-1">Simpson Index: How split is the vote?</p>
        </div>

        <!-- Formula + viz block -->
        <div class="text-sm font-mono bg-slate-50 p-4 rounded-lg border border-slate-100">

          <div class="flex flex-col gap-4">
            <!-- formula line -->
            <div class="text-slate-700 text-center">
              1 − Σ<span class="text-slate-500">(</span>
              precinct_votes / contest_total_votes
              <span class="text-slate-500">)</span><sup>2</sup>
            </div>

            <div class="text-center text-2xl text-slate-300 leading-none">=</div>

            <!-- examples -->
            <div class="flex flex-col gap-3">
              <!-- Landslide row -->
              <div class="flex items-center gap-4">
                <div class="w-8 text-xs font-bold text-slate-400">0.1</div>
                <div class="flex-1 h-6 bg-slate-200 rounded flex overflow-hidden">
                  <div class="w-[90%] bg-indigo-600"></div>
                  <div class="w-[10%] bg-indigo-200"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wide">Landslide</div>
              </div>

              <!-- Fractured row -->
              <div class="flex items-center gap-4">
                <div class="w-8 text-xs font-bold text-slate-400">0.8</div>
                <div class="flex-1 h-6 bg-slate-200 rounded flex overflow-hidden">
                  <div class="w-[20%] bg-indigo-500 border-r border-white"></div>
                  <div class="w-[20%] bg-indigo-400 border-r border-white"></div>
                  <div class="w-[20%] bg-indigo-300 border-r border-white"></div>
                  <div class="w-[20%] bg-indigo-200 border-r border-white"></div>
                  <div class="w-[20%] bg-indigo-100"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wide">Fractured</div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <p class="text-[11px] text-slate-500 font-sans">
              Higher values mean votes are spread across more choices; lower values mean one choice dominates.
            </p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

    </div>
  </section>

</div>

<script>
  lucide.createIcons();
</script>


```
